mapper.insert: insert into flag(ref_id,flag_type,owner_id) values(#{refId},#{flagType},#{userId}) where not exist select 1 from flag where ref_id=#{refId} and flag_type=#{flagType} and owner_id=#{userId}
mapper.delete: delete from feedback where ref_id=#{refId} and flag_type=#{flagType} and owner_id=#{userId}
mapper.select: select f.* from flag f where f.owner_id=#{userId} and f.ref_id=#{refId}
